english: Excuse me, can you help me?
How can I get to the airport?
Which way is the train station?
Can you recommend a good restaurant?
arabic: هل يمكنك أن توصي بمطعم جيد؟

english: What time does the store open?
Can you help me find my way?
arabic: هل يمكنك مساعدتي في إيجاد طريقي؟

english: Can I have the bill, please?
arabic: هل يمكنني الحصول على الفاتورة، من فضلك؟

english: How do I get a taxi?
Can you recommend a good place to stay?
arabic: هل يمكنك أن توصي ب مكان جيد للإقامة؟
